title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, May 19, 2020
description: It's the birthday of the playwright Lorraine Hansberry (Chicago, 1930), who wrote the classic play “A Raisin in the Sun” when she was just 27 years old.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of the playwright Lorraine Hansberry (Chicago, 1930), who wrote the classic play “A Raisin in the Sun” when she was just 27 years old.
